mapper.select: select id,text,fatherId,iconCls,leaf as menuLeaf,link,seq,isModify, isAdd, isDel, isSee from t_system_menu where flag=1 order by seq asc
select id,text,fatherId,iconCls,leaf as menuLeaf,link,seq,isModify, isAdd, isDel, isSee from t_system_menu where flag=1 AND fatherId = '0' order by seq asc

select u.id,u.text,u.fatherId,u.iconCls,u.leaf as menuLeaf,u.link,u.seq,u.isModify, u.isAdd, u.isDel, u.isSee from t_system_menu u INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_system_user_page_right WHERE userId =#{userId} ) up ON up.menuId = u.id where u.flag=1 order by u.seq asc

select t.id,t.text,t.fatherId,t.iconCls,t.leaf as menuLeaf,t.link,t.seq, k.isModify, k.isAdd, k.isDel, k.isSee from t_system_menu t left join (select * from t_system_user_page_right where userId= #{userId}) k on t.id=k.menuId where exists( select m.id,m.text,m.fatherId,m.iconCls,m.leaf ,m.link,m.seq,r.isModify,r.isAdd,r.isDel,r.isSee from t_system_user_page_right r inner join t_system_menu m on r.menuId = m.id where r.userId = #{userId} and m.flag=1 and t.id in (m.id,m.fatherId) ) order by seq asc

select t.id,t.text,t.fatherId,t.iconCls,t.leaf as menuLeaf,t.link,t.seq, k.isModify, k.isAdd, k.isDel, k.isSee from t_system_menu t left join (select * from t_system_role_page_right where roleId= #{userId}) k on t.id=k.menuId where exists( select m.id,m.text,m.fatherId,m.iconCls,m.leaf ,m.link,m.seq,r.isModify,r.isAdd,r.isDel,r.isSee from t_system_role_page_right r inner join t_system_menu m on r.menuId = m.id where r.roleId = #{userId} and m.flag=1 and t.id in (m.id,m.fatherId) ) order by seq asc
